name: ngAdvancedCache
description: ngAdvancedCache is a caching system that improves upon the capabilities of the $cacheFactory provided by AngularJS.

scripts.test: cd test && node ../node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --autoWatch false --single-run true --browsers Firefox
scripts.test_Chrome: cd test && node ../node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --autoWatch false --single-run true --browsers Chrome
scripts.test_PhantomJS: cd test && node ../node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --autoWatch false --single-run true --browsers PhantomJS
